Title: Squirmy Delight
Description:
The hidden master may have to wait. Look at these people, $p.

They are so THIN! They must be starving.

You know what we need? A big steaming bowl of Squirmy Delight.

If you find yourself near a river, try rounding up some intact skitterer glands and I'll cook up a batch.
CompletionText: Mama Bramblestaff always said Squirmy Delight will cure any hunger one way or another.
RewardText: Ha! With this I can make a stew potent enough to knock these waifish elves on their feet.
